channel.title: Need Coords help
channel.description: Does anyone know how to add a coordinate command to tell your coords or a tut to add it to the player controls tab?

item.title: Need Coords help
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:
@Jeremy368 wrote:

I have some code laying around some where for that let me check[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 20, 2008, 04:25:58 pm[/size][hr]Here is the Mypos thing he was talking about go into yor source and look for a text file labeled “CommandHadler” and put that in it some where

if (command.startsWith("mypos")) { c.sendMessage("You are standing on X=" + c.absX + " Y=" + c.absY + " Your Height=" + c.heightLevel); c.sendMessage("MapRegionX=" + c.mapRegionX + " MapRegionY=" + c.mapRegionY); c.sendMessage("CurrentX=" + c.currentX + " CurrentY=" + c.currentY);
This code basicly tells you your player height, x and y coords should b good enought but u could allways just use the moparscape client and type “::coordson” and it will put them in the bottom right hand corner. you could also get a custom interface with coords built in i have seen a few.

Good luck Let me know if it works!!

Read full topic

item.title: Need Coords help
item.dc:creator: @mr_luigi_77 mr luigi 77
item.description:
@mr_luigi_77 wrote:

I have no idea what you mean?
Try ::mypos
Or on most sources it has the coordinates on the emote tab (up from it).
